name: The Concord Consortium
tag_list: education, educational, software, technology, educational-technology, educational-software, deeply-digital, schools, teaching
overview:
The Concord Consortium is a non-profit educational technology laboratory for science, mathematics and engineering based in Concord, Massachusetts.

The Concord Consortium is made up of a diverse group of innovators who combine disciplinary knowledge, educational experience, and technological expertise in marvelous ways, all in the name of showing educational technology’s true potential to the world. Their mission is to ignite large-scale improvements in teaching and learning through technology.
